website_summaries.verdict: While not a complete and balanced meal substitute, this supplement does help with skin and hair issues.
pros: Contains additional omega 3 fatty acids, along with essential vitamins
Can be administered directly or added to food
cons: More of a coat and skin supplement than a complete liquid food topper

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest to the taste but the dogs like it! Within a few days we could see the difference in shine of fur babies hair and feel the softness. Now when I shake the bottle before putting on their food they come running so apparently they like it. We leave food out 24/7 but they seem to know the sound of the bottle. It doesn't really smell to me. I reccomend this product. Our vet even noticed it had made a difference on a new rescue fur babies fur after a week of putting it on his food and said to keep it up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kistenmacher

customer_reviews.title: Don't Forget to Shake the Bottle Before Serving
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old German Shepherd was recently diagnosed with bone cancer. Her skin and coat have always been fine, but I bought this to give her extra vitamins, minerals, and Omega-3 & Omega 6 Fatty Acids. She has no problem with the flavor, smells like vanilla. Knocking off a star because the 2 bottles I received in mid-March, 2019, have an expiration date of mid-December, 2019. Either this product has a very short shelf life or I got old stock. Also, nowhere on the bottle does it say to shake it, but several reviewers say to shake well.
customer_reviews.author: CuzKatieSaysSo

customer_reviews.title: Soft, shiny fur.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years with all my dogs, regardless of length of their coats. It leaves their fur soft and gleaming, feeling like velvet. Whenever I have run out, within days, their coats become rough and it loses its shine. The only negative is that my local Wal-Mart used to carry this product for under $4.
customer_reviews.author: Anna MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: It works too improve skin and coat!
customer_reviews.text: This worked so will to solve our coon hounds skin issues. He had terrible acne breakouts, dry skin and hair loss, but this supplement really worked, and quickly. We saw improvement in his skin and coat within days. The first week we used the recommended amount, but because it's so expensive we cut back to just squirting some on his food once a day and he continues to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 poms they hair very think and fluffy fur. the poms skin became very dry. they were alwas scratching and making sores but they had no fleas. I heard about this produt from a friend thought I would give it a try. well it works great no more scratching and their skin and coats look much better and they like it. I just put it in their food. Great product I am buying again
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Coat Health
customer_reviews.text: This has been a godsend to our Boykin Spaniel's coat. We add it to his food twice a day, and the results after a week or so are drastic. It has brought his coat back to life, making it much more shiny than ever before. Highly recommended for anyone looking to improve your puppy's coat.
customer_reviews.author: poopshakes

customer_reviews.title: Soft coat and helps dogs eat more!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a very skinny dog so used this to help encourage her to eat and to make her coat softer. This has accomplished both. When we have friends over we always get comments about how soft our dogs are!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I've seen a great difference in my dog's skin and they love the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a great difference in my dog's skin and they love the taste it gets them to not be so picky about their dog food would definitely buy again

customer_reviews.text: After a very short time, my dog's flaking skin was so much better. I'm completely happy with this product's results.

customer_reviews.title: Try Another Product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered everything for a itchy dog from this item company and not one of the products was effective. My advice is to try other products that Amazon has for itchy dogs.

customer_reviews.title: Love the product. But sent an almost expired product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has no scent, our dog thinks she is getting a treat when we put it on her food I have no issues with this product. The issue I have is with the distributor. I got this in the mail yesterday 12/8/19 and the expectation is 12/20/19! I will be looking for this product else where.

customer_reviews.title: My blue great danes had the worst skin itching problem
customer_reviews.text: My blue great danes had the worst skin itching problem. We had tried specialty foods, expensive dog shampoos, etc. This is the one product that actually works..I can not say enough about it!! My dogs stopped itching within days of starting to use this on their food. if I ever run out - the dry skin itching comes right back. It works!!

customer_reviews.text: THIS IS GREAT! I can't believe how fast it works. I drizzle a couple swirls over my dogs food every morning.....oh man her coat is so soft and shiny and her little paw pads are so soft. I have repurchased this.

customer_reviews.text: Jack would eat this with his food without too much trouble can't guarantee that it will stop the shedding but it seemed to make his coat softer. It's a product I would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my new puppies.Worked great on thier scruffy coats.

customer_reviews.text: I got this last year for my dogs. My 13 year dog got fleas and had bad reaction to the fleas and worse reaction to flea meds. She skin was very flacky and had bald spots skin and hair. Her skin has 100% better and her hair is thicker and fuller before she got fleas.

customer_reviews.text: my dog doesn't like this on dry food. but mix it with some wet food and she will eat it

customer_reviews.text: The best stuff I ever put on my dog. She loves it and the taste. Makes her hair so smooth and shinny.

product_meta.title: ProSense Skin and Coat Solutions Food Supplement, 8 oz
product_meta.description: Pro-Sense brand offers a variety of proactive, sensible solutions for all of your pet’s healthcare and wellness needs. Pro-Sense knows that pet parenting can be tough so they have improved ingredients and overall benefits to make it easier than ever to care for them. Pro-Sense Skin and Coat Solutions Liquid formula is made with powerful cod liver oil and contains essential Omega Fatty Acids that are vital to healthy skin and coat growth and care. The food supplement liquid from Pro-Sense is used simply as a food topper to support healthy coats and skin for your dog. Packed with vitamins and antioxidants that not only benefit skin and coat but also promote general canine health the Skin and Coat Liquid is a powerful solution to caring for your dog. Dr. Jeff says that maintaining the health of your dog’s skin and coat in combination with daily grooming will greatly help to minimize shedding.
